channel.title: life on ChenXin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in life on ChenXin's Blog

item.title: /ᐠ｡ꞈ｡ᐟ\ DuoDuo /ᐠ–ꞈ–ᐟ\
item.description: DuoDuo is a very cute kitty, he is my partner, my all tenderness, and the fluffy dream in my life!

item.title: >LaTeX< The Philosophy of Latex
item.description: 本文主要包括一些关于 LaTeX 的编写技巧和习惯，以下内容大都来自网络，觉得甚有道理便收集到此处。不定期更新。

item.title: About
item.description: This is ChenXin, a guy doesn’t like to post moments in WeChat, welcome to my blog! You may confuse that the word nixnehc in URLs of this blog, I just left an easter egg here, and I’ll reveal the answer in the end of this page. INFJ-A (I called that ‘16-Personality Religion’ which Yuqian「昱倩」introduced it to me) I’m extremely loyal to my family! I have long hair but short wit.
